overview: Daniel is a quite talented singer, whose parents run different businesses. They're very gifted in their jobs: the father is a barber, and the mother has a restaurant and a good hand for cooking, where Daniel helps working as a waiter. One day, the producers of a record label discover Daniel and give him a chance to work in radio and television. Nevertheless, his family will have to leave their works and their old life, in order to help Daniel in his new artistic career. Chui, Daniel's manager and a pretty woman, will help and advice him in the conflictive world of the show business, full of people waiting to take advantage of the young promises.
title: Mi canción eres tú
